WorkItem.Description:

WorkItem.Summary: [Base] System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to generate a temporary class (result=1).

Comments.Message: Try running as administrator. Somehow, you've managed to run it as a user that doesn't have permission to write to it's own temp data folder, which is very odd.
